file_content.text: I've been waiting for days. I don't appreciate being jerked around.
Who is this, anyway? Who sent you?
I'm with Intelligence. You don't need to know my name.
I represent the Empire.
Fine. No names.
I was told you could help me find the ghost cell.
Are you my contact?
Maybe. We'll see.
I'm someone who can ruin you if I don't get what I want. Clear?
Don't mess with me.
Clear. Fine.
I'll talk about the terrorists, but I need a guarantee.
If we're going to meet, no one can know. Not the ghost cell, not Imperial security.
Give me your location and stay put.
I'll come to you.
I can't. We each come halfway, or we don't do this at all.
I can't promise anything unless you tell me what's going on.
Give me more information.
I don't trust you, and the ghost cell wants me dead. That should tell you enough.
You're in no position to make demands.
Not a chance.
You don't think? We need each other, and you can't force anything out of me.
There are sentry droids all around town. Imperial model, but everyone knows their holocam feeds are insecure.
The ghost cell could use them to find me. Take out the droids, and I can make our rendezvous.
Say I agree--where do we make contact?
Then what?
No one's watching for you on holocam.
You're being paranoid.
Are you giving me orders?
You don't know the ghost cell. I'm not going to get recorded and die over a stupid mistake.
Once you've dealt with the sentries, head to the market. Give the droids' holocams to a merchant named Datto Wys. He'll send you to me.
You'll get your safe passage. Then we talk.
All right.
Datto Wys. Can he be trusted?
Who's this merchant?
He's just a drop point. Doesn't know a thing.
I didn't come here to play games. If you're toying with me....
I don't like this.
I'm not toying with you. I'm risking my life for this.
If the way is clear, I'll see you soon. Otherwise, we won't speak again.
Function unavailable. HoloNet link is offline.
